fuzzing_params.Constraints: 1 <= word.length <= 5 * 10^3, word consists only of lowercase English letters., 1 <= numFriends <= word.length

problem_info.title: 3403. Find the Lexicographically Largest String From the Box I
test_examples: Example 1:Input: word = dbca, numFriends = 2Output: dbcExplanation:All possible splits are: d and bca. db and ca.dbc and a.
Example 2:Input: word = gggg, numFriends = 4Output: gExplanation:The only possible split is: g, g, g, and g.
